tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MentalHealthPatients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis TEXT,
  treatment_plan TEXT,
  outcome TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(100),
  age INT,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  treatment_name VARCHAR(100),
  provider_name VARCHAR(100),
  treatment_date DATE,
  outcome TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES Patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PatientOutcomes (
    outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    treatment TEXT,
    outcome TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES MentalHealthPatients(patient_id)
);
